text.div:
QuestionnaireResponse Generate Health Certificate

OPERATION: QuestionnaireResponse Generate Health Certificate

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

https://worldhealthorganization.github.io/ddcc/OperationDefinition/DDCC-QuestionnaireResponse-generateHealthCertificate

Generate one or more signed QR Codes based on a DDCC QuestionnaireResponse

URL: [base]/QuestionnaireResponse/$generateHealthCertificate

URL: [base]/QuestionnaireResponse/[id]/$generateHealthCertificate

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INresponse0..1QuestionnaireResponse

The questionnaire response resource used to generate the QR code.

INid0..1id

The questionnaire response resource id used to generate the QR code.

OUThc0..1Bundle

The DDCC, including any QR codes, that was created under the Generate Health Certificate expected actions

name: QuestionnaireResponse Generate Health Certificate
description: Generate one or more signed QR Codes based on a [DDCC QuestionnaireResponse](StructureDefinition-DDCCQuestionnaireResponse.html)

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: The questionnaire response resource used to generate the QR code.

parameter.name: id
parameter.documentation: The questionnaire response resource id used to generate the QR code.

parameter.name: hc
parameter.documentation: The DDCC, including any QR codes, that was created under the [Generate Health Certificate](transactions.html#submit-health-event-expected-actions) expected actions
